title: How to Get the Mirror Secret in Roblox Classic: Easy Guide

steps.title: Join The Classic mode.
steps.content: Join The Classic mode. When this event is live, you can find it on your Roblox home page. You should spawn on a floating island. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Head north until you cross a yellow bridge.
steps.content: Head north until you cross a yellow bridge. This is the first landmark you should reach.

steps.title: Turn left and continue until you cross a purple bridge.
steps.content: Turn left and continue until you cross a purple bridge. This is the second landmark. You should reach a second, smaller floating island.

steps.title: Enter the blue and gray house.
steps.content: Enter the blue and gray house. This house will have two floors and a giant mirror.

steps.title: Stand in front of the mirror.
steps.content: Stand in front of the mirror. It should be blocking parts of the house.

steps.title: Type magic mirror into the chat.
steps.content: Type magic mirror into the chat. This will remove the mirror and let you explore the rest of the house.

steps.title: Take the ladder upstairs and enter the room.
steps.content: Take the ladder upstairs and enter the room. This room has a floating Tix within it.

steps.title: Collect the floating Tix.
steps.content: Collect the floating Tix. Tix is the currency used for the event and can be exchanged for items. The Mirror Secret quest is now complete. For more game recommendations, see our guides for the best two-player games , horror games , and co-op games .
